subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=74|rad=月|as=06|sn=10|four=72213|canj=BLMO|ids=⿰月兆}}

# for the [[moon]] to [[appear]] in the [[west]] at [[dusk]] (at the end of a [[lunar]] [[month]])

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is written with the moon radical [[⽉]]. It is not to be confused with [[脁]] (U+8101), which is written with the meat radical [[⺼]].
